headline: The 5 Most Interesting Analyst Questions From Agilent’s Q1 Earnings Call
summary: Agilent’s second quarter results reflected broad-based growth across most end markets and geographies, with particular strength in China, India, and environmental testing. CEO Padraig McDonnell attributed the 6% year-on-year revenue growth to stable demand for core instruments, continued recovery in the biopharma segment, and robust performance in pathology and PFAS (per- and polyfluoroalkyl substances) testing. Management also highlighted progress in its digital ecosystem, noting a 12% increase
